title: Louisiana Firm Recalls Cooked Meat, Poultry, and Deli Products Due To Possible Listeria Monocytogenes Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: This release is being reissued to expand the April 10, 2013 recall to include additional products. WASHINGTON, April 12, 2013 - Manda Packing Company, a Baker, La., establishment, is expanding its recall to include approximately 468,000 pounds of roast beef, ham, turkey breast...
impacted_products: Various weights of the following products are subject to recall: Roast Beef, Ham, Turkey. Corned Beef, Pastrami...
